title: Job Monitoring
description: Job monitoring in Tombolo allows you to track Work Units (WU) running on HPCC clusters. Tombolo checks the clusters every 30 minutes and monitors work units based on a specified name or name pattern. It can send notifications if a work unit enters an undesired state, deviates from the expected state, or violates punctuality rules, such as failing to start or complete within the expected time.
